trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.ItemDataBind"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: A list control contains a collection of items.
trans-unit.target: 清單控制項包含項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: These items are of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> class.
When providing default rendering, the list control represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> by its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 清單控制項時提供預設呈現，代表<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>由其<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> or associated data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: 在樣板化轉譯中，範本可能會造成的任何所需的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>或相關聯的資料繫結物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: If an item is data-bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目是資料繫結至<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handler can set properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object from arbitrary expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在這個階段中，此處理常式可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>任意的運算式中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler> delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>委派<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>控制項，必須識別處理事件的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListDataBindEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>產生項目事件時，控制項告知處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時呼叫事件處理常式。
